name: The Parallel Past
description:
Play with your past

Every time the timer end, up to 0, the loop is restarted. You can play with your previous actions to reach the treasure  and complete the level. Try to predict your future decisions, and ask for yourself what can you do in the next loop ?

You are your own ally

You can't finish a level alone, so you have to ask to your best friend. Yourself ! Make you a gold path through small puzzles to grab the treasure ! You can play in 6 levels using many different mechanics.

The Parallel Past

This project was donein 48h for a Game Jam with the theme of "Time Warp". It was a real pleasure to make it and I hope you'll find it fun. Any advice or feedback will be considered as a possible update, don't be shy to share your experience !
